page.title: 11RECREATION - LOCAL CLUBS
page.content: There is one golf course in Musselburgh called the old Musselburgh Club which is one of the oldest in Scotland. Mary Queen of Scots played there.The first open tournament was held there.Musselburgh also has several football pitches and rugby grounds,bowling greens,and a water ski-ing club.It also has a yachting club,a bingo hall and a couple of snooker clubs.Golf was played on Musselburgh Links as long ago as 1672.The golf links now form part of the race course where race meetings are held regularly.
